Perform CCA

dot-cca.Rd

This function takes either two matrices or two SVDs. Both input_1 and input_2 must be "of the same type." Calls the .compute_cca_aggregate_matrix function.

Usage

.cca(input_1, input_2, dims_1, dims_2, return_scores, tol = 1e-06)

Arguments

input_1

first input

input_2

second input

dims_1

desired latent dimensions of data matrix 1. Only used if input_1 is a matrix, not if it's a list representing the SVD

dims_2

desired latent dimensions of data matrix 2. Only used if input_2 is a matrix, not if it's a list representing the SVD

return_scores

boolean. If TRUE, return the scores (i.e., matrices where the rows are the cells). If FALSE, return the loadings (i.e., matrices where the rows are the variables). Either way, one of the output matrices will have rank_1 columns and another will have rank_2 columns

tol

small numeric

Value

list

On this page
